metadata.Title: CVE-2020-15999 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - high.
metadata.Description: Heap buffer overflow in Freetype in Google Chrome prior to 86.0.4240.111 allowed a remote attacker to potentially exploit heap corruption via a crafted HTML page.

criterions.comment: android: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
